reviews.review: 10/10 lo unico que me quejo es que no hay 3, bueno y que la historia se desvia un poco de la linea del primero, pero hacer secuelas que no tienen nada que ver a veces es el sello de Valve.
absolute amazing game, but i sometimes would glitch and get stuck on a wall. Other than that its amazing also whoever voiced glados you are amazing.

great puzzle game with
- funny and convincing voice acting
- engaging story
- moody architecture
- interesting levels

and works great under linux. Highly recommended.

Awesome game and fun puzzles, create your own and play the others. This is a great puzzle game like its predecessor
but with a more interesting story-line and more creative puzzles, an enhancement to the original classic Portal. Definitely one of my favorite puzzle games!

I‚Äôm going to get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!

Portal 2 is a fantastic story, fantastic gameplay and a fantastic game. This rich game is full of lore, story and humour in the darkest of moment's... This game is so damn good you dont have a choice. You WILL get this game, YOU WILL PRESS PLAY, YOU WILL ENJOY THIS GAME! Just trust me, this game goes on sale for like 85% off every taco tuesday, so just wait until a steam sale, and pick this baby up!

ALL HAIL WHEATLY
This game is so good. The perfect sequel to the original. Too bad most of it is looking at a loading screen. I haven't tried the co-op yet but I'm sure it also rocks.

‚òë Fantastic - I haven't had a fantastic story in any of the games I've played yet, but this one is making me think really hard because I love it. Its amazing and I'm really sad that there will be no portal 3.

‚öî Gameplay ‚öî
‚òë Frustrating
‚òê Sleepy
‚òê Boring
‚òë Fun
‚òë Challenging. - Makes me feel super clever whilst coming up with new level designs throughout the game constantly, I never got bored unless I got extremely frustrated. Also its not a repetitive cycle of frustration and relief, there are many more emotions, and the story is mixed super well with the gameplay so you get a dopamine-rush filled game.

€û Game time / Length €û
‚òê Really short (0 - 3 hours)
‚òê Short (4 - 8 hours)
‚òë Few hours (10 - 20 hours) [if you focus on the main story] [This was even longer for me because I'm quite stupid and don't know how to figure things out]
‚òë Long (40-60 hours) [if you complete everything] - I would say you'd probably be able to squeeze an extra 15-20 hours out of the co-op, and then theres co-op challenge mode and singleplayer challenge mode so you could probably play up to 40 hours if you completed everything while still having fun and being opened up to new experiences.
‚òê Very Long (61-100 hours)
‚òê Extremely Long (101+ hours)

Extra stuff - Honestly this game is one of the best games I have. [And once again - it was made a decade ago] It was super fun and enjoyable, especially when you play co-op with a friend and you get that great teamwork vibe [although I felt really dumb after my teammate just figured everything out for me.] Also there is pretty much no grind for anything in this game apart from achievements. Honestly I had no Idea that portal 2 could be fun. If you're already considering buying it, there is definitely no harm in getting it, especially since the price is so low.  
8.75 out of ten [that's very good]
Amazing but i am still stuck on the first level
